name: Lovers Wheel
description:
Have a romantic night in with Lovers Wheel.

WHAT IS LOVERS WHEEL?
Lovers Wheel is a unique way to spend an unforgettable and romantic evening in with your Partner.

The rules are simple - Sit across from each other, take it in turns to spin the Lovers Wheel and enjoy an evening of tenderness and passion.

A great way to spend time with and appreciate your partner, spin the wheel and feel closer to each other than ever before!


FEATURES:
★ 22 creative tasks for loving couples.
★ Excellent retina graphics for all your devices.


Coming Soon:
☆ New tasks.
☆ Translations.


If you would like to contact us or have anything to suggest, please visit us here http://twitter.com/tapboxltd.
